finding_summary: The “90-Day Validity” claim lacks an anchor date and cannot be reconciled to the document’s stated update/review timeline.
Sources are presented only as generic categories (including “approximately 18 recent community reports”) without enumerated citations or links, reducing verifiability.
The label “Primary Source Verified” is unsupported because no specific primary sources are identified in the provided content.
Cross-references to “Finance & Banking Hub (Thailand)” are unresolved in the provided content, creating a navigation and citation gap.
The instruction to keep files in a “Thailand 2025” album conflicts with the document’s stated update timing (Q1 2026), causing timeline confusion.
A minor copy-edit issue appears in “Fix:Before leaving,” where spacing is missing after the colon.
